metadata.name: Advanced Multi-Deck Analyzer
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Professional-grade probability analysis tool supporting 1-8 decks with advanced filtering, statistics, and data export. For serious probability exploration.

cards.note: Supports 1-8 decks with advanced filtering and tracking. Maximum 448 cards (8 decks Ã— 56 cards with jokers).

instructions.overview: The most powerful probability tool in the suite. Configure multiple decks, apply complex filters, track detailed statistics, and export your experimental data. Perfect for advanced students ready to dig deep into probability.
setup: Configure your experiment in the left sidebar
Select how many decks to use (1-8)
Choose which specific decks to include
Apply filters (by suit, rank, deck, or individual cards)
Toggle Expert Mode for advanced features
gameplay: Use 'Auto Flip' to run automated experiments
Click 'New Round' to start tracking a new experimental round
Watch deck-source badges on cards (shows which deck each card came from)
Monitor the results table for real-time statistics
In Expert Mode: view deck source charts, streak analysis, and statistical tests
Export your data as CSV or JSON for further analysis
instructions.winning: Master probability analysis! Success means understanding complex multi-deck scenarios, interpreting statistical data, and drawing valid conclusions from your experiments.

examples.title: 8-Deck Casino Simulation
examples.description: Use all 8 decks to simulate casino blackjack shoe. Track Ace probability.

examples.title: Deck Comparison
examples.description: Use decks 1 and 3 only. Filter for face cards. Compare theoretical vs experimental.

examples.title: Individual Card Tracking
examples.description: Track specific target cards across multiple decks. See which deck they come from.

examples.title: Statistical Analysis
examples.description: Run 1000+ trials. Use Expert Mode to see chi-square test and confidence intervals.
